data.name: Block Buster Billy
data.detailed_description:
Block Buster Billy is a puzzle game where you move blocks with digits and basic math operations to form numbers and equations. When you complete an equation, it turns into a big block you can move out of the way to open the treasure chest.

The NON features


There's none of these:

  • no clunky physics,
  • no confusing controls,
  • no input lag,
  • no slow animations,
  • no difficult platforming,
  • no git gud combat,
  • no time consuming cut scenes,
  • no unbalanced RNG,
  • no pay to win,
  • no easy mode,
  • no multiplayer matchmaking,
  • no summons,
  • no OP weapons,
  • no jump scares,
  • no unfair enemies,
  • no nonsense boss combos.

Just Billy... and You... And blocks, lots of blocks.

There's also some math, but it's very basic. The difficulty doesn't come from math, but from the block positioning and level layouts.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Core2Duo 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB Video RAM, OpenGL 1.1+
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
